retweeted_status.full_text: Lots of bursts of gunfire near Kabul airport this am. The Taliban have set up many checkpoints in the area.  Reports they are taking potshots at aircraft.  Aggressive posture from Taliban. Chaos

localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 今天上午，喀布爾機場附近有大量的槍聲響起。塔利班在該地區設立了許多檢查站。 據報道，他們正在對飛機進行掃射。 塔利班採取了積極的姿態。混亂
